# Authorised Signature

- Go to authorized signature menu showing authorized signature list page. There is default showing 10 rows.

<img src="../../admin/as-list.png" />

- When we need to add authorized signature click Add signature button. Now showing Add authorized signature page.

<img src="../../admin/add-as.png" />

- Enter valid authorized signature details and click submit button.

- Once authorized signature created successfully return to authorized signature list page. This created authorized signature showing in the list.

<img src="../../admin/as-list1.png" />

- Anything actions needed in the authorized signature list use action column edit icon and delete icon.
- Edit icon use to update the authorized signature details.
- Delete icon used to delete this authorized signature. This authorized signature disabled. Also disabled this authorized signature course also disabled.

### REST API

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Authorised Signature List**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "paginate": {
                "offset": 0,
                "limit": 10,
                "sort": {
                    "key": false,
                    "sortKey": "",
                    "sortType": true
                },
                "search": {
                    "key": false,
                    "searchKey": "all",
                    "searchValue": ""
                }
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "query ($input: AuthorizedSignatureListRequest) {\n  getAuthorizedSignatureList(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Create Authorised Signature**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
  "variables":{
    "input":{
      "body":{
        "name":"Vellieswaran",
        "designation":"Principal",
        "thumbFiles":[null],
        "imageAttachment":[null],
        "imageUrl":"",
        "status":1
       }
    }
  },
  "query":"mutation ($input: CreateAuthorizedSignatureRequest) {\n  createAuthorizedSignature(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Get Authorised Signature ById**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "body": {
                "certificateType": "education"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: getCountsRequest) {\n  getCounts(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Update Authorised Signature**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fc7c877d44ebded0d3554",
            "body": {
                "_id": "652fc7c877d44ebded0d3554",
                "name": "Vellieswaran",
                "designation": "Principal",
                "createdBy": "652fb7953bb12d581a57b480",
                "signImageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/sign/5b890e3d-87dc-4723-adbc-f71814cfeb88",
                "status": 1,
                "createdAt": "2023-10-18T11:55:52.909Z",
                "updatedAt": "2023-10-18T11:55:52.909Z",
                "__v": 0,
                "thumbFiles": [],
                "imageAttachment": [],
                "imageUrl": "https://crypken-bucket.s3.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/development/signature/sign/5b890e3d-87dc-4723-adbc-f71814cfeb88"
            }
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: UpdateAuthorizedSignatureRequest) {\n  updateAuthorizedSignature(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>

<dl>
  <dd>Name: **Delete Authorised Signature**</dd>
  <dd>Method: **POST**</dd>
  <dd>Headers: Authorization: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..CRG6dX11JKksEmWXFoM08D4LXmKoyMzodfJodODrWEk</dd>
</dl>
<dl>
  <dd>Body:</dd>
  ```javascript {3} copy
{
    "variables": {
        "input": {
            "_id": "652fc90a77d44ebded0d35ea"
        }
    },
    "query": "mutation ($input: DeleteAuthorizedSignatureByIdRequest) {\n  deleteAuthorizedSignatureById(input: $input) {\n    responseCode\n    data\n    __typename\n  }\n}"
} 
```
</dl>
